name: 灯織
text:
──ファンのみんな……
すごく、喜んでくれてた──……！
trans:
──Our fans...
They all sounded really happy..!

name: めぐる
text:
……えへへ
感謝祭なのに、またわたしたちが元気をもらっちゃったね
trans: ......Ehehe. Even though this event was for our fans, it seems like they made us happy too.

name: 真乃
text:
──……きっと……
私たちの恩返しの気持ちも、届いてるって……
trans:
──...Surely...
They understood our feelings of appreciation...
